episodes.name: Special Look
episodes.overview: Teaser of Joss Whedon's new TV Show where the cast present their characters and Joss Whedon (Executive producer/Director/Writer) outlines the premise.

episodes.name: Double Agent: Infiltrating the Set
episodes.overview: In the digital series premiere, a Double Agent infiltrates the set of Marvel’s Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. Working for a shadowy figure known only as the Mastermind, he encounters series regular Ming-Na Wen (Agent May) and show co-creator Jed Whedon as he works to stay ahead of Marvel Security and uncover secrets of the show.

episodes.name: Double Agent: Searching For Secrets
episodes.overview: The Double Agent visits various production departments. He uses the opportunity to secretly gather intel for the Mastermind and in the process meets Adrianne Palicki (Agent Bobbi Morse), Costume Designer Ann Foley, and Prop Master Scott Bauer. But Marvel Security is always watching...

episodes.name: Double Agent: Security Alert
episodes.overview: The Mastermind gives the Double Agent his most dangerous mission yet. After a run-in with Brett Dalton (Grant Ward), the set is put on lockdown by Marvel Security. While in the midst of a desperate cat and mouse chase, our Double Agent has an unexpected interaction with Elizabeth Henstridge (Agent Simmons).

episodes.name: Double Agent: Post Heist
episodes.overview: The Double Agent is tasked with finding the Season 2 finale, but his mission does not go as planned. In the process of evading Marvel Security, he runs into Chloe Bennet (Agent Skye) and Post Producers Chris Cheramie and Robert Parigi.

episodes.name: Double Agent: The Mastermind Is Revealed
episodes.overview: On the run with a stolen copy of the Marvel’s Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. finale, the Double Agent finds himself in a desperate car chase with Marvel Security. The Mastermind’s true identity is revealed and our adventure culminates in a startling conclusion. Special appearance by Clark Gregg (Director Coulson).

episodes.name: Slingshot: Vendetta
episodes.overview: Elena Rodriguez meets with Daisy Johnson privately. The two discuss a secret mission they shared around the time Johnson went rogue from S.H.I.E.L.D. Now that Johnson has returned, Rodriguez wants to make sure their stories are consistent in efforts of throwing off Director Jeffrey Mace. In a flashback, Rodriguez meets with Phil Coulson as he clears out his office after stepping down as director of S.H.I.E.L.D. Rodriguez contemplates signing the Sokovia Accords, but is hoping to seek out Victor Ramon, the man responsible for the death of her cousin.

episodes.name: Slingshot: John Hancock
episodes.overview: Director Mace sets a meeting with Rodriguez to have her sign the Sokovia Accords. As she does, she informs Mace about Ramon, who tells her that under the agreement of the Sokovia Accords, Rodriguez has to follow a certain procedure before going after Ramon. Unsatisfied, Rodriguez steals Mace's S.H.I.E.L.D. access card to help her get more information on Ramon.

episodes.name: Slingshot: Progress
episodes.overview: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons examine Rodriguez, during which she secretly learns Ramon is in Baltimore, Maryland. As she sets forth with the mission, she runs into Mack, who is on a mission with Coulson to track down Johnson. As Coulson and Mack's Quinjet takes off, Melinda May informs Rodriguez that Mace's credentials have been reported missing. Rodriguez realizes that May is aware that she took them.

episodes.name: Slingshot: Reunion
episodes.overview: Agent May accuses Rodriguez of stealing Mace's credentials, with Rodriguez reluctantly returning his access card. May advises Rodriguez to be mindful of her "sloppy" work and that she would not tell Mace. Instead, May grants Rodriguez access to another Quinjet headed to Baltimore, allowing her to move forward with her mission. Rodriguez finds Ramon and botches his plans to leave the city. She reminds him that he is responsible for her cousin's murder. As their encounter intensifies, one of Ramon's henchmen knocks out Rodriguez.

episodes.name: Slingshot: Deal Breaker
episodes.overview: Held captive by Ramon, Rodriguez realizes that he is attempting to sell an Inhuman weapon to members of the terrorist organization called the Watchdogs. Rodriguez is rescued by Johnson, who had come for the weapon, and holds off the Watchdogs attacks for Rodriguez to go after Ramon, who had tried to escape.

episodes.name: Slingshot: Justicia
episodes.overview: Rodriguez chooses not to kill Ramon, who is inadvertently vaporized by the Inhuman weapon as S.H.I.E.L.D. arrives. Back in the present, Rodriguez has Johnson erase any trace in S.H.I.E.L.D.'s system that she was in Baltimore.

episodes.name: Academy: Recruitment
episodes.overview: Three diehard fans attend a casting session only to find that they have actually just enrolled at the Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.: Academy. Clark Gregg welcomes the new recruits and sends them off to begin the rigorous evaluation process. Do these recruits have what it takes to be a S.H.I.E.L.D. agent?

episodes.name: Academy: Sci-Tech challenge
episodes.overview: Elizabeth Henstridge (Agent Jemma Simmons) puts the Recruit’s intelligence to the test inspired by the episode "Beginning of the End." The recruit must quickly solve a complex series of equations before time expires in order to rescue Fitz, who's trapped underwater.

episodes.name: Academy: Skydive Challenge
episodes.overview: The Recruit must prove that they are courageous enough for field work as a S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent by completing this high-altitude challenge inspired by Director Coulson’s perilous skydive in the episode “Closure.” Ming-Na Wen (Agent Melinda May) and Henry Simmons (Agent Alphonso “Mack” Mackenzie) introduce the mission. Brett Dalton (Hive) makes a surprise visit and raises the stakes with a devious twist.

episodes.name: Academy: Inhuman Adaptation Challenge
episodes.overview: In this simulation, the Recruit assumes the role of a newly reborn Inhuman on the run from Hydra. The Recruit must race through an obstacle course and recover coordinates to a S.H.I.E.L.D. extraction point before his time expires. Luke Mitchell (Lincoln Campbell) encourages the Recruit along the way, but Brett Dalton (Hive) adds a high-speed twist to the challenge.

episodes.name: Academy: Commencement
episodes.overview: The Academy Recruits join Clark Gregg and the cast and crew of Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D as they prepare for their big day playing agents on an episode of the hit show. Get a behind-the-scenes look as the Recruits go through hair, make-up, wardrobe and props before rehearsing their scene.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: As the world comes to grips with the existence of superheroes and aliens, agent Phil Coulson assembles a small group of highly skilled agents; the team's first assignment is to find a man with extraordinary -- and potentially devastating -- powers and the young computer hacker that's encouraging him to reveal himself to the world.

Coulson and his S.H.I.E.L.D. agents travel to Peru to investigate an object of unknown origin, codenamed 0-8-4. But when he runs into Comandante Camilla Reyes, more than just sparks fly at 30,000 feet.

episodes.name: The Asset
episodes.overview: When the brilliant scientist Dr. Franklin Hall is kidnapped, Agent Coulson and his S.H.I.E.L.D. agents must race against the clock to locate him. Skye is their only way in -- pushing the team to their limits when the entire plan turns upside-down.

episodes.name: Eye Spy
episodes.overview: Agent Coulson and the S.H.I.E.L.D. team try to track down a mysterious woman who has single-handedly committed numerous high-stakes heists. But when the woman's identity is revealed, a troubling secret stands to ruin Coulson.

episodes.name: Girl in the Flower Dress
episodes.overview: An elusive girl in a flower dress may hold the key to the mystery that brings Coulson and team to Asia to rescue a young man with an unusual and dangerous power. Meanwhile, Skye has a secret that jeopardizes her relationship with the team right when they need her most.

episodes.name: F.Z.Z.T.
episodes.overview: When floating bodies turn up, Coulson and the Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D must hunt down an elusive killer. No one is safe -- not even the team.

episodes.name: The Hub
episodes.overview: Dangerous secrets are being kept from Coulson's team and he works the system to save Ward and Fitz when they are sent on a Level 8 classified mission that may end in tragedy.

episodes.name: The Well
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of the events chronicled in the feature film THOR: THE DARK WORLD, Coulson and The Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. pick up the pieces -- one of which threatens to destroy a member of the team.

episodes.name: Repairs
episodes.overview: Coulson and his team are haunted by a mysterious force that threatens to destroy them all, and only a secret from May's past can save them.

episodes.name: The Bridge
episodes.overview: Coulson takes the war back to Centipede, and this time he brings in Mike Peterson for some super-soldier support. As they get closer to the truth, startling secrets are revealed and an unexpected twist threatens the team.

episodes.name: The Magical Place
episodes.overview: Coulson uncovers vital information about the mystery of his death, but, with Centipede out for blood, this knowledge may come at the cost of one of the team.

episodes.name: Seeds
episodes.overview: Coulson and May uncover startling information about Skye's past, while the team is swept into a storm at S.H.I.E.L.D. Academy.

episodes.name: T.R.A.C.K.S.
episodes.overview: Hot on the trail of the Clairvoyant, Coulson and his team board a mystery train that seems to be headed for certain death.

episodes.name: T.A.H.I.T.I.
episodes.overview: Coulson goes on the attack to save Skye - enlisting the aid of Ward's former S.O. John Garrett -- and uncovers shocking truths about his own life and S.H.I.E.L.D..

episodes.name: Yes Men
episodes.overview: When Coulson and his team are attacked by Lorelei - a deadly seductress who escaped from Asgard - Thor's Lady Sif, her longtime nemesis, steps in to try to save them.

episodes.name: End of the Beginning
episodes.overview: Agents Garrett and Triplett are back to help Coulson's team track down S.H.I.E.L.D.'S nefarious enemy - the Clairvoyant. But will Deathlok destroy them all to protect his master's identity?

episodes.name: Turn, Turn, Turn
episodes.overview: Coulson and his team find themselves without anyone they can trust, only to discover that they are trapped with a traitor in their midst.

episodes.name: Providence
episodes.overview: With Colonel Glenn Talbot now on their trail, Coulson and his team seek refuge in the last place anyone would look, where they begin to uncover S.H.I.E.L.D.'S most dangerous secrets -- secrets that could destroy them all.

episodes.name: The Only Light in the Darkness
episodes.overview: Agent Koenig puts the team through the ultimate lie detector test and Coulson races to save the life of his one true love as the mystery of "The Cellist".

episodes.name: Nothing Personal
episodes.overview: Just when there's no one left to trust, Agent Maria Hill returns to team up with Coulson as S.H.I.E.L.D. is being destroyed around them.

episodes.name: Ragtag
episodes.overview: Ward's betrayal and HYDRA's shocking secrets are revealed as Coulson's team goes undercover on a mission that leaves no one unscathed.

episodes.name: Beginning of the End
episodes.overview: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of HYDRA.

episodes.name: Shadows
episodes.overview: Coulson and his team are now wanted fugitives with limited resources -- but that's not stopping them from keeping the world safe from powerful and unseen threats everywhere. However, with new members they hardly know, will S.H.I.E.L.D. ever be trusted again?

episodes.name: Heavy Is the Head
episodes.overview: Hunted and running out of solutions, Coulson puts his team right in the line of fire in the hopes of saving them all. But with General Talbot, Hydra and Creel all on the attack, can they possibly survive? Meanwhile, a mysterious Doctor harbors some dangerous secrets that could destroy one of our core team members.

episodes.name: Making Friends and Influencing People
episodes.overview: Coulson and his team race against Hydra to get to Donnie Gill -- a dangerous gifted with the ability to freeze objects -- while Simmons is caught in the crossfire.

episodes.name: Face My Enemy
episodes.overview: While on a mission to learn more about the secrets of the mysterious writing, Coulson finds himself attacked by the only person he can trust: Agent Melinda May. Meanwhile, the rest of the team is trapped in an explosive situation, and it's up to Fitz to save them -- but is he up to it?

episodes.name: A Hen in the Wolf House
episodes.overview: Coulson's team is up against the beautiful and deadly Bobbi Morse -- Security Chief for Hydra. Meanwhile, Skye's father forces Raina to reunite him with his daughter at any cost.

episodes.name: A Fractured House
episodes.overview: The world turns against S.H.I.E.L.D. when Hydra impersonates them to attack The United Nations, and an unexpected enemy leads the charge to bring about their downfall.

episodes.name: The Writing on the Wall
episodes.overview: The team discovers murder victims with the alien glyphs on them that Coulson's been etching. All of Coulson's secrets and lies come to a head.

episodes.name: The Things We Bury
episodes.overview: Coulson and team find themselves in an epic face-off against Hydra to uncover an ancient secret, while Ward kidnaps his brother, Senator Christian Ward, for a violent trip down memory lane.

episodes.name: ...Ye Who Enter Here
episodes.overview: S.H.I.E.LD. discovers the ancient city before Hydra, but uncovering the secrets may require one of Coulson’s team to make the ultimate sacrifice. Meanwhile, May and Skye race to get to Raina before Whitehall takes her.

episodes.name: What They Become
episodes.overview: Coulson and Whitehall's forces meet in an explosive confrontation that dramatically alters everyone's fates. Meanwhile, Skye discovers shocking secrets about her past.

episodes.name: Aftershocks
episodes.overview: Coulson's team must deal with the consequences of their war with Hydra as shocking revelations threaten to tear them apart, and Hydra makes a dangerous move that may involve a traitor in S.H.I.E.L.D.'s midst.

episodes.name: Who You Really Are
episodes.overview: Coulson and team come to the aid of a confused Lady Sif, who has lost her memory after fighting with a mysterious warrior, whose true mission will send shockwaves through S.H.I.E.L.D. Meanwhile, Bobbi and Mac continue to hide their true mission from everyone close to them.

episodes.name: One of Us
episodes.overview: Cal seeks revenge on Coulson by assembling a team of Super Villains to destroy S.H.I.E.L.D. Meanwhile, May calls on renowned Dr. Andrew Garner, her charismatic ex-husband, with a crisis that threatens to tear the team apart.

episodes.name: Love in the Time of Hydra
episodes.overview: Coulson and his team are still reeling from a shocking revelation that leaves the team fractured as they must decide what to do with one of their own. Meanwhile, Bobbi and Mack reveal their true allegiance to Hunter, while elsewhere, Ward and Agent 33 embark on a personal mission.

episodes.name: One Door Closes
episodes.overview: War comes to Coulson's doorstep in a way he never anticipated as shocking revelations are brought to light, and Skye struggles to control her new abilities but will soon make a decision that irrevocably changes her life.

episodes.name: Afterlife
episodes.overview: As Robert Gonzalez makes his move, Coulson must do whatever it takes to protect the future of S.H.I.E.L.D. Meanwhile Skye's journey to control her powers take a surprising turn when she meets the enigmatic Inhuman named Lincoln.

episodes.name: Melinda
episodes.overview: The story of Melinda May's transformation into "The Cavalry" is revealed as she finds herself at a crossroads in the war between Coulson and Gonzales. As Skye learns more about her true heritage from Lincoln, the truth about the Inhumans will send her in a new direction.

episodes.name: The Frenemy of My Enemy
episodes.overview: A dangerous new alliance is formed as Coulson and Hunter turn to the last person anyone would expect, Grant Ward! As the war between S.H.I.E.L.D. factions continues, Skye and Lincoln will find themselves drawn into this conflict.

episodes.name: The Dirty Half Dozen
episodes.overview: Gonzales and Coulson must find a way to put their differences aside and work together against HYDRA, even if it means teaming up with someone they don't trust.

episodes.name: Scars
episodes.overview: Skye is torn between her loyalty to S.H.I.E.L.D. and her connection to the Inhumans as tensions rise between the groups -- and Coulson reveals a secret he’s been hiding from even those closest to him.

episodes.name: S.O.S. (1)
episodes.overview: S.H.I.E.L.D. puts everything on the line to survive a war that blurs the line between friend and foe. Coulson and his team will be forced to make shocking sacrifices that will leave their relationships and their world changed forever.

episodes.name: S.O.S. (2)
episodes.overview: Coulson and his team launch a last-ditch attack on the helicarrier to stop Jiaying from unleashing the Terrigen crystals and wiping out S.H.I.E.L.D.

episodes.name: Laws of Nature
episodes.overview: When Coulson and the team discover a new Inhuman, S.H.I.E.L.D. comes face to face with another organization searching for powered people. And still reeling from Simmons' dramatic disappearance, Fitz goes to extreme lengths to try to learn how to get her back.

episodes.name: Purpose in the Machine
episodes.overview: Fitz and the team enlist the aid of an Asgardian to unlock the secrets of the ancient monolith that swallowed Simmons, and Agent May is at a crossroads in her personal and professional life.

episodes.name: A Wanted (Inhu)man
episodes.overview: Daisy, Mack and Coulson race to protect Lincoln as Rosalind’s team hunts down the Inhuman in their quest for powered people. Meanwhile, Hunter proves that there is no line that he will not cross to exact his revenge against Ward and Hydra.

episodes.name: Devils You Know
episodes.overview: Having reluctantly agreed to share information with Rosalind Price and the ATCU, Coulson and the team go in search for the Inhuman who is killing off other Inhumans, and May feels that Hunter’s mission to take down Ward is getting too personal.

episodes.name: 4,722 Hours
episodes.overview: After her dramatic rescue from another planet, Simmons is still reeling from her ordeal and reveals how she had to fight for her life in a harsh new world.

episodes.name: Among Us Hide…
episodes.overview: The stakes get even higher as Hunter and May continue to go after Ward and Hydra, and Daisy and Coulson begin to suspect that the ATCU may be keeping a big secret from S.H.I.E.L.D.

episodes.name: Chaos Theory
episodes.overview: As Daisy and the team fight to protect Inhumans, S.H.I.E.L.D. discovers the shocking truth about one of their biggest foes. Meanwhile, Fitz helps Simmons recover information that could lead them back through the portal.

episodes.name: Many Heads, One Tale
episodes.overview: The S.H.I.E.L.D. team discovers dangerous truths about the ATCU, and Ward’s plans to destroy S.H.I.E.L.D. takes a surprising twist.

episodes.name: Closure
episodes.overview: Ward's campaign for revenge brings the S.H.I.E.L.D. team to their knees, and Coulson proves he will do anything to settle the score.

episodes.name: Maveth
episodes.overview: S.H.I.E.L.D. and Hydra go head-to-head in a battle that will change Coulson's world forever. While Daisy and her team of Inhumans fight to keep Hydra at bay, Coulson and Fitz take the ultimate risk.

episodes.name: Bouncing Back
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of his trip to Maveth, Coulson is more determined than ever to get to Gideon Malick and put an end to Hydra once and for all. Daisy and the team encounter more Inhumans who have powers as they’ve never seen before, but will they be friends or enemies of S.H.I.E.L.D.?

episodes.name: The Inside Man
episodes.overview: Coulson and General Talbot are forced to team up and attend a worldwide symposium on Inhumans, where they suspect Malick has an inside man. As the S.H.I.E.L.D. team gets closer to the truth, an unexpected traitor is revealed.

episodes.name: Parting Shot
episodes.overview: Bobbi and Hunter become ensnared in an assassination plot after tracking Malick to Russia. As S.H.I.E.L.D. races to save the lives on the line, the team is changed forever

episodes.name: Watchdogs
episodes.overview: Agent Mack and his brother step in when a radical group called the Watchdogs plans to eliminate the Inhumans; Simmons finds a powerful chemical compound.

episodes.name: Spacetime
episodes.overview: The S.H.I.E.L.D. team tries to prove that fate is not fixed after Daisy is horrified by a glimpse of the future.

episodes.name: Paradise Lost
episodes.overview: S.H.I.E.L.D. hunts for information on their dangerous new enemy, and a shameful secret from Malick’s past is exposed, threatening to destroy his Hydra legacy.

episodes.name: The Team
episodes.overview: Agent Daisy Johnson must call upon the Secret Warriors for an inaugural mission that will leave no member unscathed, and S.H.I.E.L.D. learns more about Hive’s powers, forcing them to question everyone they trust.

episodes.name: The Singularity
episodes.overview: The S.H.I.E.L.D. team is left reeling and decimated as Hive continues to sway Inhumans to his side. But there is a sliver of hope as Agents Fitz and Simmons follow a lead that may be able to stop the maniacal Inhuman once and for all.

episodes.name: Failed Experiments
episodes.overview: Coulson and his team race to combat Hive’s control over the Inhumans, as their enemy’s deadly plan for the human race is revealed.

episodes.name: Emancipation
episodes.overview: Daisy’s prophecy ticks closer towards a major loss, as the aftermath of the events of “Marvel’s Captain America: Civil War” force S.H.I.E.L.D. to register the Inhumans. But with the stakes higher than ever and Hive growing stronger, the team is tested in ways they could never anticipate.

episodes.name: Absolution (1)
episodes.overview: Hive's master plan is completely revealed, forcing S.H.I.E.L.D. into action.

episodes.name: Ascension (2)
episodes.overview: Coulson and his team take on Hive before he can set off the warhead and transform the world's population into his Inhuman slaves. However, one team member will sacrifice themselves to stop the Inhuman leader.

episodes.name: The Ghost
episodes.overview: In light of the Sokovia Accords, and with Hydra obliterated, S.H.I.E.L.D. has been legitimatized again and no longer needs to operate in the shadows. Since the world presumes that Coulson is dead, the organization needed a new Director to be the face of the organization. Coulson finds himself back in the role as an agent and teamed with Mack, and together they are tasked with tracking down and confirming the presence of Enhanced people, aka Inhumans. Agent May is tasked with training specialist strike teams, and Fitz and Simmons have taken a big step forward in their relationship.

episodes.name: Meet the New Boss
episodes.overview: Daisy goes to battle Ghost Rider at a terrible cost, and Coulson faces the new Director, and his bold agenda surprises them all.

episodes.name: Uprising
episodes.overview: As Coulson, Mack and Fitz attempt to track down and neutralize a rogue group looking to end Inhuman Registration worldwide, Simmons and Dr. Radcliffe only have hours to save May before she succumbs forever to her mysterious illness.

episodes.name: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
episodes.overview: As Ghost Rider’s quest for vengeance brings him into an explosive confrontation with S.H.I.E.L.D.. Coulson and Mack must rely on an unlikely ally in their time of desperate need. Daisy reunites with a familiar face to stop the Watchdogs.

episodes.name: Lockup
episodes.overview: As Robbie Reyes struggles to control The Ghost Rider, S.H.I.E.L.D. infiltrates a high-security prison to unravel the secrets that haunt them all.

episodes.name: The Good Samaritan
episodes.overview: The shocking origin story of Robbie's transition into Ghost Rider is revealed as the lives of Coulson and the team hang in the balance.

episodes.name: Deals with Our Devils
episodes.overview: After losing half their team, the remaining members look for answers as time begins to run out for Ghost Rider.

episodes.name: The Laws of Inferno Dynamics
episodes.overview: S.H.I.E.L.D. and Ghost Rider find themselves unlikely allies when the lives of all of Los Angeles hang in the balance.

episodes.name: Broken Promises
episodes.overview: Though Coulson and May are growing closer, Coulson remains unaware of the dark secret May is hiding beneath the surface. Meanwhile, Aida is unrelenting in her search for the Darkhold.

episodes.name: The Patriot
episodes.overview: Separated from their team, Coulson and Mack discover a shocking secret about Mace, leaving all of S.H.I.E.L.D. in a precarious position.

episodes.name: Wake Up
episodes.overview: May races to find the truth about what happened to her, while Aida’s next move could mean the death of them all.

episodes.name: Hot Potato Soup
episodes.overview: Agents Sam and Billy Koenig are hunted down to get at the Darkhold book, and only Coulson and the team can save them before the clock ticks out.

episodes.name: BOOM
episodes.overview: Daisy, Mace and the S.H.I.E.L.D. team must find a way to contain an explosive Inhuman. Meanwhile, Coulson and Mack come face-to-face with Radcliffe’s inspiration for Aida.

episodes.name: The Man Behind the Shield
episodes.overview: Mace fights for his life while Coulson and team find themselves in a deadly cat-and-mouse game as they attempt his rescue.

episodes.name: Self Control
episodes.overview: Suspicion turns to paranoia when the team doesn’t know who can be trusted as more LMDs infiltrate S.H.I.E.L.D..

episodes.name: What If…
episodes.overview: Hail the New World Order! Daisy and Simmons uncover secrets and lies in a world gone mad. With Hydra in control, they are our only hope to save everyone.

episodes.name: Identity and Change
episodes.overview: As Daisy and Simmons struggle to discover an escape route to the real world, the identity of the Inhuman leader of the Resistance is revealed.

episodes.name: No Regrets
episodes.overview: The truth behind Fitz’s turn could bring down all of S.H.I.E.L.D.

episodes.name: All the Madame's Men
episodes.overview: Daisy finds herself teamed up with an unlikely partner. Meanwhile, Aida prepares to put her ultimate end game into effect.

episodes.name: Farewell, Cruel World!
episodes.overview: Daisy and Simmons race against the clock to get the team out of the Framework, but not everyone is ready to leave.

episodes.name: The Return
episodes.overview: Coulson and the team's victory in the Framework is short-lived, revealing an even deadlier enemy looming against them all.

episodes.name: World's End
episodes.overview: With the surprising emergence of Ghost Rider, Coulson and the team attempt to stop Aida from ending the world.

episodes.name: Orientation (1)
episodes.overview: Coulson and the team find themselves stranded on a mysterious ship in outer space, and that’s just the beginning of the nightmare to come.

episodes.name: Orientation (2)
episodes.overview: As they come to their grips with their new surroundings, Coulson, Mack, and Elena are forced to make a deal with a crime lord, Grill. Meanwhile, Jemma is captured by the Kree, and Daisy discovers who was responsible for Earth's fate.

episodes.name: A Life Spent
episodes.overview: Daisy decides she will rescue Simmons – even if it means risking everything to do it.

episodes.name: A Life Earned
episodes.overview: Coulson and the team discover what their captors’ true intentions are; and in space, escape is not an option.

episodes.name: Rewind
episodes.overview: With the surprising help of Lance Hunter, nothing will stop Fitz from finding the lost team as his incredible journey is revealed.

episodes.name: Fun & Games
episodes.overview: With Daisy’s life on the line, an unexpected friend attempts to rescue her.

episodes.name: Together or Not at All
episodes.overview: Just as the team reunites, they become prey to an undefeated Kree warrior bent on killing them all.

episodes.name: The Last Day
episodes.overview: Coulson and the team discover that the most unexpected person from S.H.I.E.L.D.'s past may hold the key to preventing Earth's destruction.

episodes.name: Best Laid Plans
episodes.overview: Mack, Yo-Yo and Flint fight to keep everyone alive by starting a revolution against the Kree.

episodes.name: Past Life
episodes.overview: The team has one final chance to return to the timeline, but their actions may have deadly consequences.

episodes.name: All the Comforts of Home
episodes.overview: Coulson and the team set out to rewrite the course of humanity's fate; they're unaware that their efforts will dramatically change one S.H.I.E.L.D. agent's life.

episodes.name: The Real Deal
episodes.overview: Coulson finally reveals the mysterious deal he made with Ghost Rider, which will impact everyone on the S.H.I.E.L.D. team.

episodes.name: Principia
episodes.overview: The team goes in search of Gravitonium in order to save the world.

episodes.name: The Devil Complex
episodes.overview: As Fitz and Simmons race to find a way to seal the Rift, they are faced with one of their greatest fears manifested.

episodes.name: Rise and Shine
episodes.overview: Coulson uncovers General Hale's true agenda; it could be the end of the world if S.H.I.E.L.D. doesn't help her.

episodes.name: Inside Voices
episodes.overview: Coulson is forced to team up with surprising allies to save the world, while the S.H.I.E.L.D. team attempts to track down and rescue him.

episodes.name: The Honeymoon
episodes.overview: While an agent’s life hangs in the balance, Fitz, Simmons and Yo-Yo attempt to neutralize a weapon that could play a role in Earth’s destruction.

episodes.name: All Roads Lead…
episodes.overview: The team must find a way to stop Ruby before the prophesied chain reaction that can destroy the Earth is put into motion.

episodes.name: Option Two
episodes.overview: The team finds themselves trapped and under siege at the Lighthouse.

episodes.name: The One Who Will Save Us All
episodes.overview: A newly determined Talbot takes Coulson to meet the enemy and attempts to avert Earth's destruction.

episodes.name: The Force of Gravity
episodes.overview: Daisy's future as the destroyer of worlds could take a critical change.

episodes.name: The End
episodes.overview: Coulson's life or death is the challenge the team finds themselves in, as the wrong decision will cause the destruction of Earth.

episodes.name: Missing Pieces
episodes.overview: Scattered across the galaxy, the team works to find their footing in the wake of losing Coulson.

episodes.name: Window of Opportunity
episodes.overview: While Fitz and Enoch struggle in space, Sarge and his team move forward with their mysterious mission on Earth.

episodes.name: Fear and Loathing on the Planet of Kitson
episodes.overview: It's a wild night out on the planet of Kitson for the agents. While Fitz and Enoch try their luck at the casino, nearby, Daisy and Simmons find themselves in a much ... groovier situation.

episodes.name: Code Yellow
episodes.overview: Yo-Yo and Keller take things public; parasitic aliens threaten the human race; and someone really needs boba…

episodes.name: The Other Thing
episodes.overview: Sarge has May; Altarah has Daisy, Enoch and Simmons; and now, there are two planets that need saving.

episodes.name: Inescapable
episodes.overview: They've fought through space, time and alternate realities to find each other, and now, closer than ever, only their own demons can stop FitzSimmons' reunion.

episodes.name: Toldja
episodes.overview: After finding themselves in yet another gambling dilemma, a mysterious stranger offers Enoch and FitzSimmons a ride home where, it turns out, two shrikes aren’t better than one.

episodes.name: Collision Course (1)
episodes.overview: To face The Galaxy-Hopping Hate-Beast That Eats Planets, the team on Earth asks for help in all the wrong places. While back on the Lazy Comet, something weird is going on with Izel’s crew, and it’s not just the puffies.

episodes.name: Collision Course (2)
episodes.overview: No time for the team to play catch-up, there’s a planet to save.

episodes.name: Leap
episodes.overview: The party’s over, and now the team must trust each other in order to face impending doom and an enemy that’s closer than they think.

episodes.name: From the Ashes
episodes.overview: Out of answers and running out of time, the agents must face the ghosts of their past in order to move forward.

episodes.name: The Sign
episodes.overview: Izel uses Flint's powers to open a gateway to her dimension and bring her people through. May tries to convince Sarge that he's a good person with or without Coulson, and Deke has enough of everyone looking down on him.

episodes.name: New Life
episodes.overview: May battles Izel, Daisy and Mack fight Sarge, and Yo-Yo deals with a problem from within. FitzSimmons have to deal with another situation where they have to change the course of their natural lives, and Sarge's true people prepare to invade Earth. Who Will Survive?

episodes.name: The New Deal
episodes.overview: Coulson and the Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. are thrust backward in time and stranded in 1931 New York City. With the all-new Zephyr set to time-jump at any moment, the team must hurry to find out exactly what happened. If they fail, it would mean disaster for the past, present and future of the world.

episodes.name: Know Your Onions
episodes.overview: With the identity of the timeline-unraveling "thread" revealed, the team's mission to protect him at all costs leads each agent to question their own values. Is preserving the future of the world as they know it worth the destruction they could prevent?

episodes.name: Alien Commies from the Future!
episodes.overview: A surprise leap forward in time strands Enoch in 1931 and lands the team in another unfamiliar decade. Now, in order to stop the chronicoms from launching their future-dismantling plan, the agents must infiltrate one of S.H.I.E.L.D.'s most secure bases. They won’t be able to succeed without help from a familiar face or two.

episodes.name: Out of the Past
episodes.overview: It was just another average morning on July 22, 1955, when Agent Phil Coulson realized the importance of that day in the S.H.I.E.L.D. history books. With a chip on his shoulder and a genre-bending glitch in his system, he'd set into motion a chain of events that would hopefully preserve the timeline as we know it and ensure those pesky chronicoms get the ending they deserve. What could go wrong?

episodes.name: A Trout in the Milk
episodes.overview: After a bumpy landing in the disco decade, the team -- Daniel Sousa in tow -- reunites with more than one familiar face at the S.H.I.E.L.D. hangout and discovers exactly how to dismantle the Chronicoms' latest plan. But when they get too close for comfort, the Zephyr unexpectedly leaps forward again, this time to a date pivotal to not only the future of S.H.I.E.L.D. but to the future of Director Mack as well.

episodes.name: Adapt or Die
episodes.overview: The stakes are higher than ever when, after blowing their cover and damaging the Zephyr in the process, the team must scramble to rescue Mack’s parents, save S.H.I.E.L.D. from a chronicom infestation, and fix the ship ... all before the next time-jump. Meanwhile, Daisy and Sousa find themselves at a disadvantage against a power hungry Nathaniel Malick and his goons, and Coulson will have to do the thing he does best in order to save the future.

episodes.name: The Totally Excellent Adventures of Mack and The D
episodes.overview: After being unexpectedly stranded in 1982, Mack retreats to his childhood home to process the death of his parents, while Deke gets to work scouting a chart-topping group of new agents. With no idea if or when the team is coming back for them, time seems to finally be on their side until the killer robots show up.

episodes.name: After, Before
episodes.overview: With the Zephyr's time drive malfunctioning, the team is hurtling toward disaster and Yo-Yo may be their only hope. The only problem, to get her powers back, she'll need to enlist the help of an old adversary and revisit part of her past long hidden away.

episodes.name: As I Have Always Been
episodes.overview: A time storm ravages the Zephyr, propelling it toward destruction while simultaneously forcing Daisy and Coulson to relive their failed attempts to save the team over and over, until they find a solution or are swallowed by the storm. Making it to their next destination will take trust, courage and sacrifice from everyone on board, but it will all come down to having enough time.

episodes.name: Stolen
episodes.overview: After Enoch’s sacrifice propelled them out of the time storm, the team arrives back in 1983 where Nathanial and Kora are hard at work building an army of hand-selected anarchist Inhumans at Afterlife. When the agents split up to cover more ground, Daisy is tasked with protecting Jiaying and is compelled to confront her mother for the first time since her death; while the others quickly learn they’ll need to face yet another supercharged former enemy in order to stop Malick.

episodes.name: Brand New Day
episodes.overview: With the help of Kora on the inside, Sibyl and Nathanial continue their fight to shape a dark new future for S.H.I.E.L.D., managing to stay one step ahead of the agents along the way. If the team is going to turn this one around, they’ll have to get creative, and maybe even a little out of this world.

episodes.name: The End Is at Hand
episodes.overview: With their backs against the wall and Nathaniel and Sibyl edging ever closer to eliminating S.H.I.E.L.D. from the history books, the agents must rely on their strengths to outsmart and outlast the Chronicoms.

episodes.name: What We're Fighting For
episodes.overview: This is their most important fight, and it will take the help of friends and teammates, past and present, to survive.
